title: Designing Sustainable Outdoor Living Spaces - Earth911.com
summary: The article discusses the increasing popularity of sustainable outdoor living practices, particularly focusing on the use of eco-friendly materials such as Trex composite decking made from recycled materials. It highlights various innovations for creating environmentally responsible outdoor spaces, including water conservation methods and the use of native plants. The author emphasizes the importance of making design choices that respect the environment while enhancing outdoor living experiences.
green_innovation: TRUE, because the article describes various innovative practices focused on sustainable outdoor living, including the use of recycled materials and methods that minimize environmental impact.
business_innovation: TRUE, because the article describes Trex composite decking as a new and improved product that is significantly different from traditional decking options, introduced to meet market demands for sustainable outdoor spaces.
green_product: TRUE, because Trex composite decking is made from 95% recycled materials and is designed to reduce environmental impact throughout its life cycle, fulfilling the criteria for a green product.
green_process: TRUE, because the article outlines sustainable practices such as using low-maintenance materials and effective water conservation methods, which aim to minimize environmental impacts in the construction and management of outdoor spaces.

title: Nakuru: Dumpsite waste pickers creating wealth, jobs for low income earners - Kenya Broadcasting Corporation
summary: The article highlights the Bondeni community in Nakuru, Kenya, which is actively engaged in recycling discarded plastics and used car tyres into valuable products while also producing carbonized charcoal briquettes from charcoal dust and cow dung. These efforts not only address solid waste management challenges but also promote environmental conservation and provide economic opportunities for local residents, especially women and youth. By transforming waste into useful products, they embody a strong commitment to sustainable practices and community development.
green_innovation: TRUE: This is green innovation as it involves recycling waste materials and creating products that reduce environmental impact, promote sustainability, and contribute to economic well-being.
business_innovation: TRUE: This is a business innovation as it introduces new processes and products that significantly differ from previous methods, providing unique offerings to the market.
green_product: TRUE: The products created from recycled plastics and the charcoal briquettes qualify as green products, as they are designed to significantly reduce environmental impact throughout their life cycles.
green_process: TRUE: The recycling processes used by the community for plastic and tyre conversion into new products, as well as the production of briquettes, minimize environmental impacts and promote sustainability.
likely_naics_codes: Likely NAICS Codes: 325120 - Industrial Gas Manufacturing, 321999 - All Other Wood Product Manufacturing, 488320 - Waste Collection, 423990 - Other Miscellaneous Durable Goods Merchant Wholesalers
greenwashing: FALSE: The article does not describe an instance of greenwashing; instead, it provides genuine accounts of community efforts to promote environmental sustainability and waste reduction.

title: Historic DOST Visit To MSU-IIT Signals A Bright Horizon For Scientific Advancement - Journal Online
summary: The article discusses a visit by officials from the Department of Science and Technology (DOST) to the Mindanao State University – Iligan Institute of Technology (MSU-IIT) to evaluate projects that promote sustainability and innovation in various research centers, showcasing breakthroughs in renewable materials and construction technologies. It emphasizes the collaboration between the university and DOST in fostering research that meets societal needs while aiming for environmental conservation.

title: News - Retail India News: Kanine Collaborates with Myntra, Unveils Global Pet Fashion Brands in India - Indian Retailer
summary: Juicy Chemistry and Mommy Shots by Amrita launched the 'Scars are Beautiful' campaign to celebrate postpartum bodies and stretch marks, promoting self-love and body positivity among mothers. The campaign features 11 mothers sharing their experiences and embracing their bodies despite societal perceptions. Leaders of both organizations emphasize the strength and resilience represented by these scars, aiming to shift the narrative of beauty to include all women. The campaign serves as a reminder of the transformative power of motherhood.
